background: Hi there! I'm Aidan, a motivated software developer passionate about software engineering and machine learning. I built projects relevant to these two fields in both academic and industrial settings while acquiring a solid Computer Science foundation at the Hong Kong University of Science and Technology and the University of Waterloo.

The invaluable hands-on experiences shaped me into a proficient developer capable of writing clean code for sophisticated systems while adhering to standards and best practices. Alongside my technical expertise, I possess exceptional interpersonal skills, fostering seamless collaboration with engineering teams.
Aspiring to shape the future with technology, I look forward to every opportunity to implement innovative ideas into real-world solutions. Let's embark on an exciting tech adventure together!
